document.heading: Fair Student Funding and School-Based Budgeting Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-87, the “Fair Student Funding and School-Based Budgeting Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-309. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 3, 2013, and December 17, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 2, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-257 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-87 became effective on February 22, 2014.
